headline: Fermium Research Downgrades LyondellBasell (LYB) to Hold, Keeps $50 Target
summary: LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (NYSE:LYB) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks Paying 4%+ Yield in 2025. On December 3, Fermium Research downgraded LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (NYSE:LYB) to Hold from Buy and maintained a $50 price target. LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (NYSE:LYB) isn’t performing well in 2025 as the stock is down by over 40% since the […]

headline: LyondellBasell (LYB) Is Down 7.1% After Large Q3 Write-Downs And Net Loss - What's Changed
summary: LyondellBasell Industries recently reported a third-quarter net loss of US$890 million, driven mainly by US$1.20 billion of non-cash asset write-downs and transaction costs, while management emphasized ongoing cost savings under its Cash Improvement Plan to support free cash flow. At the same time, critics have highlighted the company’s heavy exposure to cyclical, commodity-driven markets and relatively high leverage, underscoring execution risk around its shift toward more sustainable,...
